channel.title: Add Stuff To Shops HELP
channel.description:
hi,im working on coding...
and im hoping i can be good at it
trying harder and harder each day ;)
so if someone could help me and tell me how to add items to shops and please post examples that would be nice :)
thanks :P

you rock tho thanks

also can you help me out by like helpin me make sure no spammers spam my thread? ( under server advertizment ) " pures isle "

item.title: Add Stuff To Shops HELP
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

at the end of a shop…Ex:

shop = 1 Fine_PKing_Supplies 1 1 391 5000 3751 2000 3749 2000 3753 3000 3755 2000 1127 2000 1079 2000 1093 2000 1163 2000 7535 5000 7460 2000 7461 5000 7462 5000 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 3105 5000 6524 5000 6568 5000 6106 500 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 .

At the end add the object id. Ex 1044 for green phat, hit tab and type in how much of that object so it would look like this for 1044 and 1 phat

shop = 1	Fine_PKing_Supplies					1	1	391	5000	3751	2000	3749	2000	3753	3000	3755	2000	1127	2000	1079	2000	1093	2000	1163	2000	7535	5000	7460	2000	7461	5000	7462	5000	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500	3105	5000	6524	5000	6568	5000	6106	500	6107	1000	6108	1000	6109	1000	6110	1000	6111	1000	1044    1

USE ONLY TAB
